title: This is why i left NA
body:
Came back to NA after months cus why not, after a 10 game chat restirict, just got 25 game chat restrict for this, and i only been playing 2-4 h0ours after work lately 

Game 1
Rolant Riven: if you take another kill
Rolant Riven: im going to leave bot lane
Rolant Riven: tf
Rolant Riven: swap lanes with me
Rolant Riven: Nunu hard camping mid.
Rolant Riven: Demair, don't ult til someones going to die : /
Rolant Riven: ww, your bad, and you banned my riven, and you let 2 kills walk away cus your blind...
Rolant Riven: hate when noobs just take my kills, i can't carry, if everyone just KS's me, and flames cus they are bronze without a clue
Rolant Riven: Warwick, muting you, but big tip, stfu, you are bad and 0 dragons..
Rolant Riven: ROFL....  hes bad
Rolant Riven: Warwic, your welcome for the carry Mr.Toxic
Rolant Riven: you idiot.. NA is actually downs...
Rolant Riven: oh wow... they nerfd teemos AP scaling?
Game 2
Rolant Riven: keystones dont mean shit, just play better ....
Rolant Riven: he has a bf sword and 3 kills, stop fighting him and just farm pls
Rolant Riven: alistar/graves camping me mid...
Rolant Riven: jax, camp bot lane, or delte this game pls., stop going for singed, just let him proxy...
Rolant Riven: rofl, i'm an idiot cus i tell you to do something? Muted, stay bronze kid.
Rolant Riven: i ping you that they are doing the dragon ...
Rolant Riven: This jax... lol
Rolant Riven: jax, i could of carryd botlane, if you weren such a flaming r%%%%%..
Rolant Riven: go around jax??? box him in idiot

After the feeding idiots on my team flamed me all game, mind you i had chat restrict and these were in 40 min games, so they did alot more typing then i can even attempt, honestly think theres something wrong with the report system on NA, or ppl are just idk... wish the game had a voice feature or everyone could grow up

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

Good
Leave
Forever
Bye
How can you play this game for years and not be Challenger, Explain
Because I have no want, need, desire, or time, to do so. How can you be such a whiny, toxic child? Explain

whiny, toxic, child? you seem kinda mad bro, and sounds like a shit excuse for being bad man lol
Building Negatron first item vs Viktor though, yeh i can see why your stuck in silver
Toxicity only builds off of toxicity I suggest you either learn to manage your anger or just mute everyone, or you could just stop playing the game and relieve everyone here of your toxic attitude.

I am in Gold LOL Why don't you look at my match history before saying what I do, I havn't faced Viktor in ages. LMFAO. Why would I be mad? I'm not the one who got chat restricted for 25 more games xDDDDDDDDDD

Edit: https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=jargon+wan

NA seems bitchy : / 
Stay gold my freinds.

Stay lvl 12
And chat restricted
I'll bet you came from EU :D

This looks like SoloQ.
>Rolant makes a post
>Jargon flames
>Rolant protects himself without really being toxic 
>Everyone gang up on Rolant
Honestly just play on EU and never step in U.S it is a joke.

This looks like logic

> Rolant is being toxic and got chat restricted 
I say to get out of NA
Rolant tries being sarcastic
I reply with my answer and a flame
Rolant becomes ignorant and tries to flame without even looking at my op.gg or ANYTHING about me
Everyone gangs up on Rolant cause we all want him out of NA

First game on Lolking, is you vs a Viktor.
This is actually NA. cba. just an ignorant emotional wreck.
Gubye, as he said, Enjoy silver.

I repeat my earlier statement,
>Because I have no want, need, desire, or time


You wanna tell me why you are a lvl 30 blank account?

Oh, and you are Still wrong about my 'game' vs viktor, you saying all that SHOWS you are being stupid and didn't even look at my account before being an idiot and accusing me of something that is so far fetched (everyone downvoted you)
Your ignorance and lack of intelligence offends me
what did we do in eu :(

You're the only one who's really being mad. And rank shaming only makes you look like even more of an unappreciative player. If you can't manage to have even a bit of self control, then you're no better than the players you flame and throw blame upon.
I am in Gold it's fine :)

> whiny, toxic, child? you seem kinda mad bro, and sounds like a shit excuse for being bad man lol


Rolant Riven: ww, your bad, and you banned my riven, and you let 2 kills walk away cus your blind...

You were saying?
na cuz you just dont have the skills to be that high an elo :D

How can you be smurfing with a KDA of less than 2 and a kill prticipation that bad. you insult his rank but from what i see, you're not very good. Especially considering you main riven and are playing with unranked scrubs.
So you left NA because you are kind of a jerk? Okay.

You are responsible for your own actions.

Being flamed does not mean you have to flame them back. Just mute and keep on playing to the best of your ability, report them for flaming you, and move on.
Stop being such an stereotypical Riven main pls.
R u retarded?
Unfortunately, I'm not. You'll have to look for kindred spirits elsewhere I'm afraid :(
This is old yeah, but look what youve said.you did it to yourself.
This is old, yeah; so why did you feel the need to necro it for a debatably pointless comment?
